officialTitle: Effects of Amitriptyline on Central Pain Processing in Healthy Volunteers Depending on CYP Pharmacogenetics
inclusionCriteria:
* Healthy
* Male
* \>7 Metabolic Equivalents
* Written informed consent
* Must be MALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Chronic pain syndrome
* Drug abuse
* Alcohol abuse
* Suspicion of neurologic dysfunction at tested sites
* Ongoing treatment with antidepressants
* Ongoing treatment with analgesics
* Pretreatment with any CYP3A inducers or inhibitors
* Known allergy to tested drugs
* Elevated eye pressure
* Obstructive uropathy
* Heart disease
* Pulmonary disease
* Neurological disease
* Psychiatric illness
